name: The Lone Mountain
description:
WASD: move

TAB: pause

E: interact with ladder

LEFT CLICK: attack (if you are holding an item)

RIGHT CLICK: pick up/ drop item

CTRL: dodge roll

SHIFT: sprint

MOUSE: rotate camera

Description:

Fight the Minotaur 1v1! FYI, your character is invincible during dodge animations. The awesome fight music is by LaghCat Metal. Here is their YouTube channel:
